name: web-playground
description: 웹 기술을 탐색하고 실험하기 위한 개인 공간입니다.

scripts.build: pnpm -r run build && pnpm run copy-dist
scripts.copy-dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -r entry/dist/* dist/ && mkdir -p dist/react-sample && cp -r packages/react-sample/dist/* dist/react-sample/ && mkdir -p dist/preact-sample && cp -r packages/preact-sample/dist/* dist/preact-sample/ && mkdir -p dist/express-sample && cp -r packages/express-sample/dist/* dist/express-sample/ && mkdir -p dist/nest-sample && cp -r packages/nest-sample/dist/* dist/nest-sample/ && mkdir -p dist/next-sample && cp -r packages/next-sample/.next/* dist/next-sample/
